name: Mom's Spaghetti Western
description:
Mom's Spaghetti Western is a 1v1 shooter where each person must find the only gun in the level before the other does and shoot the opponent. You only get one shot with the gun, so don't blow it! Whether you hit or not the gun spawns randomly within the level once again, leaving you and your opponent frantically searching for it. First to 10 kills wins.
This game is LAN only at the moment
